titles.title: A resolution honoring and thanking Terrance W. Gainer, former Chief of the United States Capitol Police.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 4/27/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that the Senate honors and thanks Terrance W. Gainer (former Chief of the U.S. Capitol Police), his wife Irene, and his entire family, for a professional commitment of service to the U.S. Capitol Police and Congress.
